overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Welcome to Loopus & Maintain - where we maintain buildings with the same dedication Sisyphus had for his boulder! Our PWA helps coordinate maintenance services because, as Kafka would say, 'In the fight between you and the building, back the building.' üèóÔ∏è

corePlatform.title: Core Platform
corePlatform.multilanguage: Multi-language Support (EN, ES, FR) - Because Babel wasn't just a tower
corePlatform.auth: Secure Authentication - More layers than Dante's Inferno
corePlatform.email: Email Management System - Faster than Hermes' winged sandals
corePlatform.business: Business Management Features - Running smoother than Gatsby's parties
corePlatform.documents: Document Storage & Management - Filing system that would make Dewey proud

services.title: Maintenance Services
services.electrical: Electrical Maintenance - Harnessing Zeus' power responsibly
services.plumbing: Plumbing Services - Navigating pipes like Theseus in the labyrinth
services.ironwork: Ironwork Solutions - Crafted with Hephaestus' precision
services.woodworking: Woodworking - Carpentry that would impress Geppetto
services.architecture: Architectural Consulting - Because even Poe cared about the house of Usher's foundation

business.title: Business Tools
business.management: Client & Provider Management - A network Dickens would write about
business.tracking: Service Tracking System - More precise than Phileas Fogg's schedule
business.invoice: Invoice Generation - Keeping books better than Bob Cratchit
business.rating: Rating & Review System - Critical analysis worthy of Virginia Woolf

pwa.title: PWA Features
pwa.offline: Offline Functionality - Like Robinson Crusoe, but with better tools
pwa.notifications: Push Notifications - More reliable than Poe's raven
pwa.workers: Service Workers - Harder working than Boxer from Animal Farm
pwa.updates: Real-time Updates - Swifter than Hermes' messages
